reviews.review: Great game, mechanics easy enough to understand, so that the game is straightforward, yet hard to master,so it doesn't become boring. The competitive scene used to be one of the most august of esports, so, maybe, if people start playing the game anew, we can bring that back. Worth a try,at the very least.

Reached Global Elite on two alt accounts. 
Bought Prime just to start grinding on this account. 
Two competitive matches in and I have already been accused of hacking and people have called me multiple slurs.
Few things can beat this feeling. 
11/10

Comunidade que é muito tóxica. Além disso, acredito que poderiam tornar os bots mais inteligentes no modo experiente. Os bots são muito previsíveis em qualquer modo. Além disso, a fase treino poderia ja vir no cs go sem precisar baixa-la. Jogo é excelente so elogios
читеров дохуя и когда ты без читов все говорят что ты читак так что игра хуета

Итса памойка засосет тебя по уши :D
P.S. Но если готов, дерзай...
es muy bueno salvo por los cheats de la gente que asco dan
Эмоциии очень крутые, не зря купил прайм статус, всем удачи
Ai nx geimas bet losiu nes
Always fun to play and improve
Melhor jogo de FPS de todos os tempos, pena que os hackers estragam parte do jogo.
jen co dodat tak kdyby odstranili VAC i kdyz nečituju ani netusim jak se to pouziva tak me to vyhazuje občas
Nice made me happy made me smile nice
Aguante el cs toda la vida
Просто крутая игра и ещё мажор только что был. Na Vi просто пушка
Well....this game is more than 20 years old and (a lot of) people still play it....I think I dont need to say much more than that

>see a guy
>shoot him
>miss every shot
>he turns around
>kills me in one shot
>exit cs:go

10/10
очень хорошая игра, особенно полезно учится польскому языку в ней kurwa
很 好 我的最喜爱的游戏之一
очень хорошая игра и все нравиться
good for smurf, dont play it if you are new :D
Game is good but team is no good.
Gra piękna i dobra nauka rosyjskiego nawet tych słów, których w szkole cię nie nauczą

Coming back to this game recently after not playing for 5+ years was a real eye opener, seeing how awful this game is to play now casually, the skill cap has heavily dropped, running and gunning is now viable and apparently pushed as a meta, weapon balance is way out of wack, like insanely, and hitboxes seem to be worse? (i don't know how this is even possible, since they were dogshit when i was playing around 2016), i wouldn't recommend getting into this game anymore unless you sincerely enjoy playing the counter strike franchise, there's much better shooters out there right now for casual play, just play those
ekkora egy faszsagot eletemben nem basztam
